commodities.title: Engine Optimisation Can Reduce Emissions Costs As EU ETS Reaches Full Phase-In
commodities.description: With maritime transport now operating under the 100% phase-in of the EU Emissions Trading System, shipowners are placing greater emphasis on engine optimisation as a means of controlling emissions-related operating costs, according to German engine diagnostics specialist CM Technologies GmbH (CMT).
